1/ FacebookCoin is good for Bitcoin.  I was a Facebook game developer since 2007.  FB already had their own stablecoin called "Facebook Credits" in alpha since 2009.  Devs were forced to drop all other payment methods to integrate FBcredits in 2011.  It failed fast, gone by 2013.

Coinbase is the AOL of #bitcoin.   It provided a useful onboarding service for a time until it faded away into obscurity from terrible business practices and being out competed by the open web.  So too will be the fate of Coinbase. It's simply an onboarding tool, nothing more.
